parameters.content:
### ðŸ–¼ï¸ Edit Images with the **OpenAI ImageGen v1** API

1. **Verify Your Organization**  
   Log in to the OpenAI Platform and confirm your org is verified:  
   [OpenAI Settings â†’ Organization]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

2. **Add Your API Key**  
   In the n8n credentials, paste a valid **OpenAI secret key** into the `API_KEY` field.

3. **Run â€œOpen Chatâ€**  
   Trigger the **`Open Chat`** node, supply your **text prompt** and **source image**, then execute.

4. **Preview & Automate**  
   The new image appears in the **`Convert to File`** node. From here you can:  
   - Send it by email  
   - Push to S3, Supabase, or any storage  
   - Post straight to Slack, Discord, etc.

> *Tip â€” chain additional n8n nodes to watermark, resize, or schedule social-media posts automatically.*

parameters.content:
[![AI-Image Cash Machine â€“ banner]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}



### This is just the core of our bigger â­ AI Image Cash Machine Template â­

## ðŸš€ Launch Your **AI-Image Cash Machine** This Weekend

**Customizable Â· Beginner Friendly**

ðŸ’¸ **Special Summer Deal â€” 10 % off with code `SUMMER25` (just â‚¬5+)**

[Grab the template on Gumroad â†’]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

---

### Why Youâ€™ll Love It
- **Plug-and-Play App** â€“ Next.js front-end on Vercel, wired to Supabase, Stripe, n8n & OpenAI  
- **No-Code Automation** â€“ drag-drop n8n workflow delivers images instantly after payment  
- **Built-In Payments** â€“ Stripe keys + webhooks included, start charging the moment you deploy  
- **Scalable Storage** â€“ private Supabase bucket keeps every customer image secure  
- **Own the Source** â€“ MIT license lets you tweak, brand, even resell without lock-in  

> **Try it live:** **Pixarify Online** â€“ see the template in action!  

---

### Whatâ€™s Inside
- Production-ready **frontend UI** (Next.js + Tailwind)  
- Pre-configured **n8n backend** triggered by Stripe webhook  
- Step-by-step **PDF setup guide**  
- Sample environment file (`.env.example`)  

---

### 3-Step Fast-Track Setup
1. **Clone the repo** & run `vercel deploy` â€” live site in 5 min  
2. **Paste your Stripe + OpenAI keys**  
3. **Activate the n8n workflow** â€” start selling AI images immediately

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# OpenAI ImageGen1 Template

## Overview
Automated workflow: OpenAI ImageGen1 Template. This workflow integrates 6 different services: convertToFile, stickyNote, httpRequest, set, stopAndError. It contains 9 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 9
- **Node Types**: 6
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **HTTP Request**: httpRequest
- **Convert to File**: convertToFile
- **When chat message received**: chatTrigger
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **API KEY**: set
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Error Handler**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for 179754ad**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for 0aca28af**: stopAndError

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
